definition: to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

sentences.english: Some arise from common law. Others are statutory.
sentences.chinese: 它們有些源起於普通法，其他則是屬於成文法。

sentences.english: This bloke was breaking the unwritten rules for men.
sentences.chinese: 這個傢伙打破了男人們應該遵守的不成文規則。

sentences.english: There's a kind of unwritten law about what to wear.
sentences.chinese: 關於穿什麼有種不成文法。

sentences.english: Often it's the rule and not the exception.
sentences.chinese: 通常這無一例外的成了一條不成文的規則。

sentences.english: The UK has no written constitution.
The authorities deny seizing land and blame ancient, unwritten ownership laws.
sentences.chinese: 官方否認了徵地，譴責那種傳統不成文的賭地權法律。

sentences.english: Hongyan Chang Fei-ray, fish and dragons written submersible water jump.
sentences.chinese: 鴻雁長飛光不度，魚龍潛躍水成文。

sentences.english: The powers and duties are confered on the tribunal by the statutory code.
sentences.chinese: 成文法典賦於法庭權力與責任。

sentences.english: Laws of different countries, therefore, almost always attempt to combine their written laws with their public orders and social customs.
sentences.chinese: 因此各國法律均注重公序良俗與成文法的兼容。

sentences.english: United States Constitution is the world's first writtenconstitution.
sentences.chinese: 美國憲法同時還是世界上第一部成文的憲法。

sentences.english: These groups provide written materials for the education of health professionals and the lay public.
sentences.chinese: 這些團體提供成文材料教育健康專家和大衆羣體。

sentences.english: The lack of a written constitution is a peculiarity of the British political system.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏一部成文憲法是英國政治體系的特點。

sentences.english: The plain vernacular words, majority of which has no verification, are combined with varied Buddhist vocabularies.
sentences.chinese: 淺近的口語詞語和變化的佛教用語交互成文。

sentences.english: The unwritten laws of good sportsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 愛麗斯被指責違反這條不成文法。
但是，要記住一個不成文的規定。

sentences.english: Making use of written or common law the serf -owners set up penitentiaries or private jails.
sentences.chinese: 農奴主運用成文法或習慣法，設立監獄或私牢。

definition: writing style (formal)/to send an official written communication
rules/regulations/constitution/statute/articles of association (of company)/articles of incorporation/charter (of a corporation)/by-laws
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
